data.name: Setr's Auto Battler
data.detailed_description:
Build your team!


Build your own fantasy team and try them out in the arena!
Each turn you get to purchase units from the shop and try to get the strongest composition.
Use this time wisely, buy and sell units, find the best synergies.

Fight in the arena!


When you have your desired team, send them to the arena and see if they succeed!
The Arena is automated, you just have to sit back and watch as you fight someone else's team.

Win matches to win the game!


Can you build the perfect team to get 15 wins?

Features

  • 30+ playable units to build your team from!
  • No time limit! Go grab a coffee and continue!
  • Asynchronous online mathmaking, each time you battle someone who recently submitted their team!

The game is in beta! New units, new features and updates are coming.

data.short_description: A fantasy themed casual auto battler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 12
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
